data.actual_result: the woman or man emoji (depending on which pilot you tested with) and the airplane emoji both paste into the box instead of the pilot emoji
data.expected_result: the selected pilot emoji pastes correctly into the message box
data.short_description: pilot emojis dont paste correctly into message box from Emoji & Symbols menu on MacOS
data.steps_to_repro: - open Discord on **MacOS** - begin typing a message - goto edit --> emoji & symbols - click on the male or female pilot emoji
